page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN DELABOLE
page.content: "My Dad's Job" from a survey completed by children in our school. By Barbara Trewin and Catherine Tanner Out of 55 families only 7 of the fathers are unemployed.However only 7 dads work in the quarry.There are 6 builders,but only 1 architect. Shops.There are 4 ordinary shop keepers,1 fish merchant, 2 butchers,3 bakers and 1 salesman.There is also 1 antique dealer. Travelling workers.There are 3 lorry drivers and 1 digger driver. There are 3 farmers,2 carpenters 2 mechanics,1 fireman,1 milkman, 1 chartered accountant,and 2 labourers.There are 2 cheese makers who work at Davidstow at Diarycrest, 1 factory worker, and 2 people work at Kellands. Only 1 dad works for the Council.
